# Task Lists

## Simple Tasks

- [ ] Unchecked task
- [x] Checked task
- [ ] Another unchecked
- [x] Another checked

## Nested Tasks

- [ ] Main task
  - [ ] Subtask 1
  - [x] Subtask 2 (done)
  - [ ] Subtask 3
- [x] Completed main task
  - [x] All subtasks done
  - [x] This one too

## Mixed With Regular Items

- Regular list item
- [ ] Task item
- Another regular
- [x] Completed task
- Final regular item

## Tasks With Formatting

- [ ] **Bold task**
- [x] *Italic completed*
- [ ] Task with `code`
- [x] Task with [link](https://example.com)

## Long Task Descriptions

- [ ] This is a very long task description that might wrap to multiple lines in the editor
- [x] Completed: Review the pull request and ensure all tests pass before merging

## Edge Cases

- [ ] Task at start
- [x] Task in middle
- [ ] Task at end
